tool_description: this  API show  last Crypto News around the world
name: last crypto news
title: last crypto news

api_list.name: Get all news all coins
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://last-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com/altcoins"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "last-crypto-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
